verbs.description: [V: iceland] [ARGM-LOC: on] [ARGM-MNR: high alert] [ARGM-ADV: with volcano due to erupt when katla erupts] it wo n’t be fire but flood waters that will engulf the valley below it eyjafjallajökull iceland peters island magnus tumi gudmundsson mýrdalsjökull katla bjorn hafsteinsson university of iceland volcano earthquake
